title: Tech Giant 'DataSecure' Faces Lawsuit Over 2024 Breach
author: Emily Roberts

content.intro: DataSecure, a cloud storage provider, is facing a $12 million lawsuit after a 2024 cyberattack exposed millions of users' private files.

sections.title: Scope of the Breach
sections.content: Hackers exploited a vulnerability in DataSecureâ€™s encryption system, gaining access to sensitive documents, photos, and financial records of over 3 million users.

sections.title: Proposed Settlement Terms
sections.content: The company has agreed to pay affected users between $250 and $5,000, depending on the severity of damages. Business clients may receive higher compensation.

sections.title: Security Upgrades
sections.content: As part of the settlement, DataSecure must implement stronger encryption and multi-factor authentication (MFA) across all platforms.
